title: Review: ‘How to Dance in Ohio,’ a Documentary on HBO, Follows Three Women on the Autism Spectrum
text:
Published By: NYTimes Television - Today 
The filmmaker Alexander Shiva focuses on a social skills therapy program for young people on the autism spectrum in Columbus, Ohio.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
